title: Video: DOD cancels redesigned “kill vehicle” program for ballistic missile defense
author: Sean Gallagher
description: DOD takes its search for a multi-target interceptor into recompete.

title: This is what it’s like driving a Bugatti Chiron at 305mph
author: Jonathan M. Gitlin
description: We caught up with Bugatti's Le Mans-winning test driver at the Frankfurt auto show.

title: Richard Stallman leaves MIT after controversial remarks on rape
author: Timothy B. Lee
description: Free software pioneer has history of controversial comments about underage sex.

title: NBC Peacock is Comcast’s dive into the crazy streaming-video fray
author: Sam Machkovech
description: Exclusive series, classic TV reboots, and Saved by the Bell with a possible new Zack.

title: Aquaculture may be the future of seafood, but its past is ancient
author: Kiona N. Smith
description: A study suggests that people in ancient China started farming carp around 6200 BCE.

title: Oh, frak: There’s another Battlestar Galactica reboot coming
author: Kate Cox
description: All of this has happened before, and all of this will happen again...

title: Splitting water to make cement could clean up a dirty industry
author: Scott K. Johnson
description: Cement production is about 8% of CO<sub>2</sub> emissions.

title: The worst US tropical system this year may not even have a name
author: Eric Berger
description: The Houston metro area falls into the highest risk category.

title: Instigator of fatal Kansas swatting receives prison sentence
author: Kate Cox
description: Viner arranged the swatting after losing a reported $1.50 bet.

title: Missiles and drones that hit Saudi oil fields: Made in Iran, but fired by whom?
author: Sean Gallagher
description: Evidence shows Iran supplied cruise missiles, "loitering munitions" used previously.

title: Audible fires back at book publishers, says captions are fair use
author: Timothy B. Lee
description: "Audible Captions is not a book of any kind," Audible writes in court filing.

title: Google’s next flagship smartphone launches October 15
author: Ron Amadeo
description: We'll see the Pixel 4 and probably a bunch of other Google hardware.

title: Password-exposing bug purged from LastPass extensions
author: Dan Goodin
description: Google Project Zero finds and reports flaw in widely used password manager.

title: Knives made of frozen feces don’t make the cut, disproving well-known legend
author: Jennifer Ouellette
description: The knives simply melted upon contact, leaving behind streaks of melted poop.

title: WSJ: Amazon changed search results to boost profits despite internal dissent
author: Jon Brodkin
description: Amazon denies report; WSJ says algorithm uses factors associated with profitability.

title: Spouse of Ring exec among lawmakers trying to weaken Calif. privacy law
author: Kate Cox
description: The assemblywoman said her husband's job has nothing whatsoever to do with it.

title: Disney CEO Bob Iger resigns from his Apple board seat
author: Samuel Axon
description: The news came in an SEC filing on Friday.

title: It’s real and it’s spectacular: Netflix buys exclusive rights to stream Seinfeld
author: Sam Machkovech
description: 5-year "global" deal begins in 2021; lands as services battle over classic series.

title: Dear Honda, this adorable electric car needs to come to the US
author: Jonathan M. Gitlin
description: This battery-electric hatchback was the best thing at the Frankfurt auto show.

title: After Sacklers shift at least $1 billion around, Purdue files for bankruptcy
author: Beth Mole
description: The OxyContin-maker filed for bankruptcy as part of a proposed $10-$12 billion deal.
